description: This file serves as the entry point for a React application. It imports core libraries, styles, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' within a React.StrictMode boundary.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render a React component tree into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot().render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.
